asset.name: UMA 2
asset.author: UMA Steering Group
asset.notes: -DynamicCharacterAvatar - advanced avatar and clothing system --Loading from Asset Bundles and Resources --Asset bundle encryption --Parameterized DNA for Races -Upgraded base avatars -Unity 5.5 compatibility -Improved custom inspectors for objects in Unity Editor -Expression editor -Placed UMA representation in Edit mode -Alpha Cutout system -Global texture scaler -Animator dont get rebuilt on UMA update -New scenes - New avatars, Networking, LOD -General speed up. -Lots of general fixes.
